1431650.name: The Wonderful 101: Remastered Demo
1431650.description:
A team of heroes from around the world must UNITE to protect the earth from vicious alien invaders! This band of 100 Wonderful Ones works together using their fantastic abilities to create a variety of forms. Whether it be a giant fist or a sharp blade, they’ll use their wits and power to overcome the enemy’s pitfalls and perils! And the final member of this team of courageous heroes—is you.

To thank everyone who supported
The Wonderful 101: Remastered, we've released a demo with all of Operation 001!
You can also get Wonder-Bayonetta and a stash of items!
You can even transfer demo save data to the full game and continue!
This game is a demo version. Please note the following:
- Data from the demo can be used with the full version.
- Full version save data can't be used with the demo.
*Please update the full game before transferring save data.
1431650.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
